Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-10148 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.30.3-10
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-10148 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.30.3-10. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package cmake is earlier than 3.30.3-10, affected by CVE-2025-10148
